mapper.select: select * from board order by seq
mapper.insert:
insert into board (seq,title,content,writer,password,regdate,cnt) values (board_seq.nextval,#{title},#{content},#{writer},#{password},sysdate,0)
select nvl(max(seq),0) from board
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer} where seq=#{seq} and password=#{password}
update board set cnt=cnt+1 where seq=#{seq}
mapper.delete: delete from board where seq=#{seq} and password=#{password}
